page.title: 12HOUSES AND POPULATION
page.content: Questionnaires were given to 185 home From the 146 families who replied we found the following information: In our area an average of three people live in each house. 15% of the people lived alone. We found that 25% of the population were school age or under, 58% were 18 to retiring age and 17% were over retiring. Only 5% of the total population were under school age, compared with 17% who were over retiring age. Half of the families questioned had lived in their homes for 10 years or less and half for over 10 years. We found that 49% owned their own house, 35% were buying it and 15% were renting them. 1% lived in tied houses. The ages of the houses were: 7% less than 10 years old, 40% between 10 and 100 years old and 50% over 100 years.
